author: dan.mercurius
title: Purpose Entities AoA (Game~B!)
description: It's not possible to setup a legal entity that is tied to a purpose and not susceptible to hostile take overs (Game~B entity).

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal took a while for my mind to wrap around it's purpose. Let me state that on the surface - as written the proposal does not address the Challenge Brief, its' metrics or its' goals. I rated it as a two - disagree and not a one - strongly disagree due to a glimmer inside what I percieve may be the intention of the proposal.
The request is for the community to fund the translation of a document for a Purpose entity aka Steward Ownership.  There is a convention in Germany later in 2022 to promote what appears to be the American concept of an ESOP (Employee Stock Ownership Plan). 
__________________________________________________
The proposal does not address the Challenge in its request for translation funding of the document due to its there being no tie in to Legislative activities such as Lobbying, educating, rule change in the Crypto Currency industry. My suggestion to the proposer would be to edit the proposal and state how your translation will address these Challenge Metrics.
f6_assessments.q1:
Based on a previous translation the translation is highly likely to be done and would address the plan presented which is why i rated it as a five. The budget clarity, timetable, Implementation, etc are fine per the plan. The Risk Management statement may be over the top (Nuclear Holocaust in Europe), though with current events, let me pull back my statement. The Risk Management statement is on point.
___________________________________________________
However, even though it is an extremely low budget request and as I stated in the first section I see a glimmer, The proposal does not address the Challenge brief.
f6_assessments.q2:
The auditability is clear and auditable. The KPIs are straightforward. The Proposal though, does not address the Challenge.
__________________________________________________
To the proposer I would state that if you rewrite your document and demonstrate how your translation can or will help with world or European legislative lobby efforts for Crypto Currency it may be rated higher.

f6_assessments.q0: Proposer has given the problem, however, the information is not detailed, the proposer should give more detailed information about the problem so that the voters can clearly see the importance of the solution. The information related to the solution is quite good. Proposer provided the services that the Purpose Foundation provides to solve the problem. Proposer also showed the impact of the solution on Cardano. However, the proposer has not yet outlined how this solution works and has not stated the risks that the project may face in the future and how to reduce that risk.
f6_assessments.q1: The timeline and plan information provided is only an outline, not detailed information. Proposer should share more about the project implementation plan so that voters can better understand the steps of the project. Proposer has provided a decent spending plan when it comes to details like cost per word per translation. However, the information of team members is not clear, basic information such as name, work experience is not provided. Proposer should add more information to the sections.
f6_assessments.q2: The goal for success is pretty good when the proposer clearly states that he wants 1 AoA to be used within the next 6 months. Proposer should provide more KPIs/Key metrics used to assess the progress and development of the project so that the voters can better understand the measurement criteria that the team sets, even though the team has provided a GIthub link to follow and track.

f6_assessments.q0:
Since most of the companies find hard in creating or finding a template for Articles of Association for Purpose Companies and Cooperatives. This proposal helps them to directly buy the templates and even get data translated with minimal cost.
The Current legal entity frameworks are prone to hostile take overs or making very high profits ,so this proposal helps in keeping the wrappers in minimal which will attract all kinds of people, hence this proposal effectively addresses the challenge.
f6_assessments.q1:
Since the proposed task is of very low risk and however Translation of Cooperative AoA has already been done, and translation of co-operation will also be completed within 3 weeks of fund assigned , so completion of task can be successfully.
Even dividing the company shares boost every worker to work towards the objective of the company, which  will be more effective for  companies policy.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal has failed to explain the marketing strategies of the company to attract more people towards this entity, and the proposer should have had high key indicators for the success of the business.
Excluding above mentioned points the proposer has produced clearly budget breaking strategy, and their previous experience related to translation hence the information provided is sufficient to audit the progress and the success of the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal outlines the creation of an articles of association for a purpose company based upon the translation and changes required from their existing work of setting up a purpose driven cooperative. If DAOs and DisCos are more easily able to create and manage legal structures that protect the interests and rights of those involved then this proposal aligns well with the challenge brief. The complexity of legal structures is a common issue for many projects and more so those that are trying to become DAOs where there is little guidance provided.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer has experience in creating and running a cooperative with the SecretDecks team making them well suited to understanding the pitfalls and hurdles for people to get over on a general basis. There are risks on feasibility here due to the complexity of the application of law and the differences between each country. It is not clear from the proposal exactly which countries this would be useful and which it would not. The budget break down is provided and is reasonable, the project plan is simple and all that is needed considering the small scope of the proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: Issues concerning the project will be tracked with Github and the proposal team would like to see the usage of the AoA produced by a team within 6 months. Considering the small scope of the proposal these metrics appear fair and suitable. There is also sufficient clarity for this proposal due to the documents and information provided.

solution: Creating a template for Articles of Association for Purpose Companies and Cooperatives, that can be used to setup legal entities/wrappers.
experience:
Researching purpose companies and how to set one up, since mid 2021.

Translated Articles of Association from German into English for the SecretDecks cooperative.
